name: Capacity-building and networking events for nature-based solutions and re-naturing in Malta
lead: Malta College of Arts, Science & Technology
description: ReNature aims to establish and implement a nature-based solutions research strategy for Malta with a vision to promote research and innovation and develop solutions in a pursuit of economic growth, whilst at the same time improving human well-being and tackling environmental challenges. The strategy will be complemented by a newly-developed research cluster to act on it, with a vision to stimulate both scientific excellence and innovation capacity towards achieving the goals of sustainable development. This project supported the article on hedgerows “Are field boundary hedgerows the earliest example of a nature-based solution? By Marcus J. Collier https://renature-project.eu/search.php
